thread.section_title: Seton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hidden gem in the heart of Manhattan
thread.title_full: A hidden gem in the heart of Manhattan - Review of Seton Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Johanna A
title: A hidden gem in the heart of Manhattan
text:
We stayed 6 nights: 7-13 September 2016 and our group consisted of 4 families - total of 14 guests (from 2 to 70 years old) so planning was key. Prior to our booking we contacted the hotel and Lucas answered our emails promptly and provided detailed information about the hotel. When we arrived - we found the check-in/out process to be hassle free, the premium room with double bed (private bathroom) was clean and spacious, location is central and perfect for us. Tips for future guests: there is only one lift and is small, so if you are claustrophobic - request for rooms in level 2 & use the stairs. There is no bar fridge in your room but you can request this for an extra fee. There is no tea or coffee maker in the room but you can get this in the common area along with ice machine. Only request I have for management is to add a drinking water station for guests to refill their water bottles. Overall it was value for money! I recommend Seton for guests looking for a convenient location and comfortable stay that is still within a reasonable budget.
Room Tip: Contact the hotel for any special requests. The staff are helpful and willing to cater to your reque... See more room tips
